content: smoothfox s holiday star created by donna mason-svara aka smoothfox ©2010 version 2 0 lily sugar n cream cotton 4 ply color a red hook size h - 8 - 5 00 mm skill level advanced beginner size 7 x 7 yarn needle special instructions none my ravelry store http //www ravelry com/stores/smoothfox-crochet-designs my etsy store http //smoothfox etsy com my crochet merchandise http //zazzle com/smoothfox* my blog http //smoothfoxlover blogspot com/ if you crochet this item please click on this link and add your own pictures as a project on ravelry just click on the crochet hook with the words hook it near the top right side and this will add your item as a project then you can add the pictures when you have completed your project http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/free-smoothfoxs-holiday-star instructions chain 6 slip st in first chain to form a ring round 1 chain 3 double_crochet in ring chain 2 * 2 double_crochet in ring chain 2 repeat from * 6 times join with slip st to top of beg chain-3 16 double_crochet round 2 slip st to chain-2 space chain 3 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in chain-2 space * 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next chain-2 space repeat from * 6 times join with slip st in top of beg chain-3 32 double_crochet 8 chain-2 sps round 3 slip st to chain-2 space chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet in chain-2 space * 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet in next chain-2 space repeat from * 6 times join with slip st in top of beg chain-3 48 double_crochet 8 chain-3 sps round 4 slip st to chain-3 space chain 3 3 double_crochet chain 5 4 double_crochet in chain-3 space * 4 double_crochet chain 5 4 double_crochet in next chain-3 space repeat from * 6 times join with slip st in top of beg chain-3 64 double_crochet 8 chain-5 sps created by donna mason-svara aka smoothfoxlover@yahoo com 2010 this pattern has been tested please notify me of any pattern corrections i will answer any and all questions you may have with the instructions do not plagiarize this pattern all patterns are my original designs please do not re-sell my patterns or give them away for free or post my patterns on the internet you may sell items you make from my patterns at craft fairs fund raisers or custom orders for friends and family but please do not sell finished items on the internet without my written permission do not claim designs as your own this pattern is copyrighted by me and i give my permission for you to post pictures of items made from my pattern on your website if you will post a link back to my etsy store if the pattern is for sale if the pattern is free please direct people to my blog be sure to list the name smoothfox as the designer
